TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PopupMenu extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A PopupMenu displays a Menu in a modal popup window anchored to a View.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Android.Content.Context context, class Android.Views.View anchor) cil managed

Docs.param: Context the popup menu is running in, through which it can access the current theme, resources, etc.
Anchor view for this popup. The popup will appear below the anchor if there is room, or above it if there is not.
Docs.summary: Constructor to create a new popup menu with an anchor view.
